from enigma import getDesktop, eSize, ePoint desktop_w = getDesktop(0).size().width() desktop_h = getDesktop(0).size().height() listcount = 0 iconsize = 53 itemheight = 45 padding = 45
maxwidth = desktop_w - 120 minwidth = desktop_w // 2
listwidth = self["list"].instance.size().width() + (iconsize + padding) if listwidth > maxwidth: listwidth = maxwidth
if listwidth < minwidth: listwidth = minwidth
maxtextwidth = listwidth minheight = iconsize
if self["list"] and self.list is not None: listcount = len(self.list) if itemheight*listcount > minheight: minheight = itemheight*listcount
if not self["text"].text: textsize = (maxtextwidth, 0) else: textsizeoriginal = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (maxtextwidth, textsizeoriginal[1])
listsize = (maxtextwidth, itemheight*listcount)
self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, 0)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, textsize[1] + 30))
wsizex = listwidth wsizey = textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 60 if wsizey < minheight: wsizey = minheight wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((desktop_w-wsizex)//2, (desktop_h-wsizey)//2))
